WorkItem.Description:
Hey Guys.
 
I recently tried to download Rawr again, after getting a new computer. it usually worked. but now that i downloaded it. i Extracted it on desktop, then when i press the icon in the folder. It says.
 
Rawr.exe - Application Error
 
The application failed to initialize properly (0xc0000135). Click on OK to terminate the application
 
 
 
I've tried downloading previous versions and they still cant open, and they display that same Error.
 
Yeah.. so has anyone else had this problem? How do i fix it?

Comments.Message: I believe some people have experienced the same. Try searching the forum or issue tracker for 0xc0000135 and I believe you should find a few solutions!
